colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI BCOM LDAN 'DAS RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI BSANGS CHO GA YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA, 'DI YANG 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE'I GSHED KYI LUNG RTOGS KYI BSTAN PA THAMS CAD PHYOGS DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS PA'I CHED DU DMIGS NAS SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG 'JAM DPAL MING CAN GYIS KUN SLONG NGAN MA SLAD PAR DAD SEMS KYI SGO NAS LEGS PAR BSGRIGS PA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
